title: Lewis Favorite Honey Cake
directions: Heat oven to 350Â°F with rack in middle. Generously spray pan, including center tube, with baking spray.
Add all other dry ingredients alternately with Tea/Coffee
Pour batter into pan (it's liquid enough to level itself in the pan), and bake in oven until springy to the touch and a cake tester comes out clean, 45 to 50 minutes. or 210 degrees on thermometer
Let cake cool in the pan on a rack for 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup lukewarm strong coffee or tea
